name: yahoo-finance_get_current_stock_price
description: Get the current stock price based on stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

name: yahoo-finance_get_stock_price_by_date
description: Get the stock price for a given stock symbol on a specific date.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

name: yahoo-finance_get_stock_price_date_range
description: Get the stock prices for a given date range for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

start_date.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: yahoo-finance_get_historical_stock_prices
description: Get historical stock prices for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

period.description: The period for historical data. Defaults to "1mo". Valid periods: "1d", "5d", "1mo", "3mo", "6mo", "1y", "2y", "5y", "10y", "ytd", "max"

interval.description: The interval beween data points. Defaults to "1d". Valid intervals: "1d", "5d", "1wk", "1mo", "3mo"

name: yahoo-finance_get_dividends
description: Get dividends for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

name: yahoo-finance_get_income_statement
description: Get income statement for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

freq.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid freqencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trainling"

name: yahoo-finance_get_cashflow
description: Get cashflow for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

freq.description: At what frequency to get cashflow statements. Defaults to "yearly". Valid freqencies: "yearly", "quarterly", "trainling"

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

limit.description: max amount of upcoming and recent earnings dates to return. Default value 12 should return next 4 quarters and last 8 quarters. Increase if more history is needed.

name: yahoo-finance_get_news
description: Get news for a given stock symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.

name: yahoo-finance_get_recommendations
description: Get analyst recommendations for a given symbol.

symbol.description: Stock symbol in Yahoo Finance format.
